report.title: My Friend Gabby
report.author: justagirl
report.bodytext: I take 2 600mg of the white oval kinda chalky pills at a time. I have anxiety problems and Gabby helps me to chill the f out. /n /n Pros: helps me chill out, more social /n Cons: shakiness, weird thoughts like worrying I'll get addicted to the shit /n /n I have a 2 year old girl and I play with her and take care of her just as well on it as I do off of it, but it's not something I would or do take every day, just when I feel I need to chill out.
